wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Roe, 1st Baron Roe (13 July 1832 – 7 June 1923), known as Sir Thomas Roe between 1894 and 1917, was a British businessman and Liberal politician, particularly associated with the town of Derby.

response: *Thomas Roe, 1st Baron Roe, businessman and Liberal MP, 1883–95 & 1900–16.
*Thomas Roe, 1st Baron Roe (1832–1923), British businessman and Liberal politician
